doc.title: 2 Days Later with Jools Holland
doc.plot: Well-known UK TV host and musician Jools Holland presents a gala concert featuring world famous performers playing alongside disabled musicians from The Drake Music Project. Performers include Bonnie Tyler, Paul Carrack (Mike and The Mechanics), Graham Lyle, Tina May and Frankie Miller. A song debut, "The Sun Goes Up", written by Will Jennings (Titanic) is sung by Bonnie Tyler and Paul Carrack. Also features musicians from the Scottish Chamber Orchestra and Repurcussion.

Well-known UK TV host and musician Jools Holland presents a gala concert featuring world famous performers playing alongside disabled musicians from The Drake Music Project. A song debut, "The Sun Goes Up", written by Will Jennings (Titanic) is sung by Bonnie Tyler and Paul Carrack. Also features musicians from the Scottish Chamber Orchestra and Repurcussion.
